subject: Horse Racing
Kentucky Derby
Santa Anita Derby
Jockeys, Drivers and Trainers
lead_paragraph: Kevin Krigger, who will ride Goldencents in the Kentucky Derby, will be attempting to become the first black jockey to win the race since Jimmy Winkfield won in 1901 and 1902.
snippet: Kevin Krigger, who will ride Goldencents in the Kentucky Derby, will be attempting to become the first black jockey to win the race since Jimmy Winkfield won in 1901 and 1902.
